About Classroom Material Distribution

Welcome to Classroom Material Distribution!

Classroom Material Distribution is a platform designed to streamline the process of managing and distributing educational resources to students and teachers. This system enables teachers to upload, manage, and track various classroom materials such as textbooks, study guides, and other resources.

Features

  • Material Uploading: Teachers can upload various classroom materials and categorize them accordingly.
  • Material Requests: Students can request materials based on availability and relevance to their courses.
  • Approval System: Teachers can approve or reject material requests based on their assessment.
  • Material Tracking: Both students and teachers can track the status of requested materials.
  • Secure Login: Only authorized users (teachers and students) can interact with the system through secure logins.
